organizations: New York City Gay Hockey Association
lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Friday about a meeting between Madison Square Garden officials and advocacy groups to discuss concerns over the shouting of antigay slurs at Rangers games referred imprecisely to the role of Christine Quinn, the City Council speaker, in addressing the issue. Although she helped arrange the meeting, she was not present. The article also omitted part of the name of an advocacy group. It is the New York City Gay Hockey Association.
